corenet 0.0.1
  • Reference

corenet

The goal of corenet is to provide a set of functions to generate ‘core’ route networks for transport planning.

Install it with:

if (!require("remotes")) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}
remotes::install_github("nptscot/corenet")
